html:
July 29 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • Q1 OPERATING PROFIT ROSE 67.6 PERCENT TO 352 MILLION USD

  • Q1 UNDERLYING EBITDA ROSE 42.4 PERCENT TO 534 MILLION USD

  • Q1 BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE ROSE 200 PERCENT TO 0.033 USD

  • Q1 UNDERLYING EARNINGS PER SHARE 0.032 USD

  • Q1 REVENUE ROSE 30.7 PERCENT TO 1.112 BILLION USD

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
